history.proof: intros a aP H. unfold nf. simpl. destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a) as [x H']. shelve.

ctx: destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a) as [x H'].
exceptions.tactic: pose (canonical_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA A cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x H') as H''.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : Cb a aP x : poly A0 eqA ltM H' : reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec aP (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM a) (s2p A A0 eqA n ltM x) The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a : poly A0 eqA ltM) (aP : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), Cb a aP -> Cb (nf a aP) aP

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
nf = fun (p : poly A0 eqA ltM) (L : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) => let (x, _) := Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os L p in LetP (poly A0 eqA ltM) (poly A0 eqA ltM) x (fun (u : poly A0 eqA ltM) (_ : u = x) => let (x0, H'2) := u in exist (fun a : list (Term A n) => canonical A0 eqA ltM a) (mults multA (n:=n) (unit (mks A A0 eqA n ltM x0 H'2)) x0) (canonical_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Cb = fun H' : poly A0 eqA ltM => let (x, _) := H' in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x : poly A0 eqA ltM -> list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Prop Arguments Cb _ _%list_scope
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope

Reducestar_pO_imp_CombLinear : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
reduce0_reducestar : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> exists t : list (Term A n), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p t
eqTerm_spminusf_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a c nZc p q) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b c nZc p q)
multpf_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA ->...-> eqP A eqA n (multpf A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec p q) (multpf A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec q p)
irreducible_eqp_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q
ltP_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> ltP (A:=A) ltM q p
CombLinear_reduceplus : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
CombLinear_reducestar : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p
CombLinear_reduce : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p

```   
intros a aP H.
unfold nf.
simpl.
destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a) as [x H'].
pose (canonical_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA A cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x H') as H''.
destruct H'' as [a' Ha'].
apply (reduce_cb A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a aP H Ha').
```

original: intros a aP H. unfold nf. simpl. destruct (Reducef A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a) as [x H']. pose (canonical_mults A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA A cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec x H') as H''. destruct H'' as [a' Ha']. apply (reduce_cb A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os aP a aP H Ha').
